<js>if (result.includes("DDoS")) { java.longToast("Cookie è·å–ä¸­ï¼Œè¯· 5 ç§’åé‡è¯•"); } else { result }</js>
div.item
ruleSearch.name: div.item>dl>dt>a@text
ruleSearch.author: div.item>dl>dt>span@text

ruleContent.title: h1.title@text
ruleContent.replaceRegex:
<js>
result = result.replace(/\s*[ï¼ˆ|(]æœ¬ç« å®Œ[)|ï¼‰]\s*/,"");

if (title.length < 5) { result = result.replace(new RegExp(`\\s+?${title}\\n`),"") } 
else { result = result.replace(new RegExp(`\\s+?${title.substr(0,title.length*2/3)}.*\\n`),"") }

result.replace(new RegExp(`\\s+?ç¬¬\\S+?ç« .{0,${title.length}}\\n`),"");

result = result.replace(/\s*-+\s*/g,"");
</js>

ruleExplore.name: li>span.s2>a@text
ruleExplore.author: li>span.s4@text
ruleExplore.coverUrl:
<js>
let bookUrl = result.select("li>span.s2>a").attr("href");
let bookId = bookUrl.match(/\d+/)[0];
let imageBaseUrl = "https://www.kaye-ge.com/images/";
let imageDetailUrl = `${parseInt(bookId / 1000)}/${bookId}/${bookId}s.jpg`;
imageBaseUrl + imageDetailUrl;
</js>
